website_summaries.verdict: This styling cream locks in moisture to protect hair, even with frequent use of a blow dryer and other heat tools. The quality ingredients are a plus.
pros: Earns praise for how well it protects hair from the drying effects of blow drying
Made without parabens, phthalates, and other harsh chemicals
Makes hair feel soft, and tames frizz and fly-aways
Suitable for loose and tight curls
cons: Although many users love the scent, some find it a bit overpowering
Tends to feel oily if you use a lot

customer_reviews.title: If you have curly hair you’re gonna love this
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. I have spiral curls. This stuff takes amazingly. I put on before I drive my hair with a diffuser in my curls were drop dead gorgeous and the frizzies for next to nothing. I meant to buy something else but I picked the wrong product when I got it in the mail I decided to keep it. I am so glad I did it’s always going to be a part of my curly hair arsenal
customer_reviews.author: CharlieFB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t weigh my fine hair down!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Finally a blow out product that smooths my frizz, lessens my tangled, but doesn’t weigh my hair down or make it feel tacky!!! I have wavy to straight hair, fine, but a lot of it, and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: RainRiverOcean

customer_reviews.title: Frizz free
customer_reviews.text: I have fine curly hair and am always on the hunt for something that will tame my frizz without weighing my hair down— because it definitely doesn’t need that. This product is working well thus far, it gives my curls a much sleeker look as well keeps them tame and calm. A little goes a long way and if you use too much, your hair gets a little tacky. Great product that I’m really glad I’ve found!
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Beret

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin curly hair. It weights it down enough. Only downside is my hair feels oily sooner than it normally would.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love, love,  LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a hot and humid day in GA to see what my hair really does with this product and.......I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER! I have corse, frizzy, curly hair that I straighten because the frizz when its curly is just too much. But today I see how this product keeps the moisture out and keeps the frizz down. I'm in LOVE!! I WILL continue to buy this product and recommend it to frizzy headed girls like me! (Yes that is a storm approaching in the background so it is HUMID!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hair product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’m on my third bottle and will buy again and again! I have very fluffy, thick hair which I style with a curling iron or flat iron three times a week. This stuff keeps my hair frizz-free, soft, and shiny. And it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Penrose

customer_reviews.title: No more frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have frizzy hair thanks to this stuff. If you use too much your hair will feel tacky so the trick is to figure out the maximum you can use without getting tacky.
customer_reviews.author: rh1

customer_reviews.title: Smooths frizz and protects hair from heat.
customer_reviews.text: I like to run a straightening brush through my hair and this is a great heat protector cream. It seams to seal off your hair and protect it well from heat damage. It has a good texture and smells awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Hair Product!
customer_reviews.text: Made of rosehip, argan, and coconut oils, this hair product moisturizes, smooths, and de-frizzes hair. In Oklahoma, we are already getting humid weather, and this product totally eliminates the flyaways, kinkies, etc. that occur. I also love the shine! It’s a 4-ounce bottle, so use it sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: EEMF

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality shine
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great, but isn't too strongly scented, and it makes my hair incredibly shiny. Every single time I use it I get compliments and people have asked if I went to a hair salon. Wish the container was bigger but will continue to buy regardless!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great product (thin/fine/bleached hair)
customer_reviews.text: I've tried and loved other Briogeo products, and this one is no exception. I have very fine hair that's been bleached, so my hair is definitely damaged and has started to break. I only air dry my hair now, but on ocassions when I wanted to dry or straighten my hair I love using this to protect it! I even use it on the days when I'm air drying my hair, because it helps remove frizz, keeps my hair moisturized, and even helps my hair dry straight. It's definitely a great product and is well worth the money (especially since you only need a little bit of product).
customer_reviews.author: Claire Timbrell

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product. I feel like it does not leave me hair greasy or heavy; especially because i have thin hair. I would recommend this product to others. I also love the smell - very light aroma, does not over power.
customer_reviews.author: Ulyana

customer_reviews.title: only thing i put in my hair now
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bottle of it. I have dry hair from heat styling it for years. This makes my hair soft and shiny. I will keep buying it. Smells so good too. i put it on my damp hair and let my hair air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Best heat protectant ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great heat protectant that leaves your hair looking shiny and frizz free!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Garza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this because I absolutely love it. My hair smells so good and feels so much more manageable with this!!! Must Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my naturally curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I have naturally curly hair. Putting this in my wet hair allows me to pick through easily. And it helps to keep my curls soft without frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Audra S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really do anything
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much for my curly hair. Still frizzy. Didn't like the feeling of it in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: BookReader

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I can use a good amount and it does not leave any residue in my hair! Plus it smells so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Ferman

customer_reviews.title: *** AMAZING ***
customer_reviews.text: I just recently discovered Briogeo products and I am in love!!! They small amazing and work great!! I used the heat protectant cream and it left my hair smelling great, soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but bit too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I am not sure If i will purchase it again. I have not felt a dramatic difference in my hair enough to keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bitnaly Song

customer_reviews.title: Finally Frizz Free!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product done as a comparison on the web “MILABU” with fantastic results. Yup tried it and finally one that really does work!!!
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well and smells great! Lightweight and makes my hair smooth and soft. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Flood

customer_reviews.title: Lovee!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My hair is shiny and all my frizz is gone !
customer_reviews.author: miriam Samekhova

customer_reviews.title: fights my frizz!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine and frizzy hair! No matter what, its frizzy! I finally tried this after receiving a sample in a beauty box, and fell in love! I use it in damp hair and blow dry and NO FRIZZ! Its crazy how great this works! I highly recommend it!! I'm so in love with not having frizzy hair, I will be a repeat customer now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Best overall anti-humidity treatment for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well, almost perfectly, when humidity is below 70% and blow-drying-only my fine-yet-thick hair. When the humidity is higher, my hair starts a 'slow-motion, back-to-natural wave' *without* frizziness! This product does NOT inhibit natural shine like another product I have, nor does it make my hair feel heavy or wax-coated like a third product. No straightening iron was used to review this product. I prefer not to use a straightener, because it's damaging. If it's more humid than 70%, I let my hair go curly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tube because it has worked so well at straightening my naturally curly hair into a smooth bob. Seems to last a little longer when humid than other products have.
customer_reviews.author: B. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough if you're a novice, better if you're a pro
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because it's what my stylist uses when she dries my hair, and I have way less frizz when she does it than when I do it. That said, it definitely still helps a lot just at home with reducing the amount of frizziness I get while drying my hair. If you're better than I am at it, then this will probably be a 5 star product for you. Regardless I'd definitely say it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing to prevent my hair from being frizzy. I used as directed, but my hair felt dirty. It had no extra shine and was as frizzy as ever. I had no added benefit from using it. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Funk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for two years now. I will not go to any other product. This has been great on my hair, but recently became a lifesaver when my daughter's hair got in a massive tangled mess. I washed it two times and conditioned it, but this product is what truly saved us from cutting her hair. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth hair
customer_reviews.text: It has a good smell and make my hair smooth. Make sure you apply it on damp hair. I totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ririe_09

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great , feels great putting it on my hair but the frizz is still there . Its not as thick and heavy on my hair like other products but not as impressed as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfec, I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, its really good, I used it all time annd my hair its always beautiful and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my curly hair protected and I really see a difference in the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Kiplinger
